title: It's written that photos occupy huge storage (32 GB), but when i check photos occupy only 189MB
content:
All photos are synchronized in google photo, they are deleted from smartphone. But in the settings it is written that storage is full of photos. When I click on "images (32gb)" i can open this folder in google photo and in google files. And when I select all objects it's written that they occupy only 189MB and it happens in both these apps. Help me please
p.s. sorry for my English, it is not my native language
